title: Methods returning same value - describe conditions

content.question: Which of the following best describes the conditions under which methodX and methodY return the same value?

choices.label: When a and b are both even
When a and b are both odd
When a % b is equal to zero
When a % b is equal to one

content.answer: When a % b is equal to zero

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
